price: Sema: Mola wangu Mlezi asinge kujalini lau kuwa si kuomba kwenu. Lakini nyinyi mmemkadhibisha. Basi adhabu lazima iwe.
arabic: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُاْ بِكُمۡ رَبِّي لَوۡلَا دُعَآؤُكُمۡۖ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبۡتُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا
footnotes: Ewe Mtume! Waambie watu: Mwenyezi Mungu hakutakini nyinyi ila mumuabudu Yeye, na mumwombe Yeye katika mambo yenu, wala msimwombe yeyote mwenginewe. Na kwa hayo ndio kakuumbeni. Lakini makafiri katika nyinyi wameyakanusha waliyo kuja nayo Mitume. Basi adhabu yao itawaganda hao, wala hapana wa kuwaokoa nayo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul mā yaʿba-u bikum rabbī lawlā duʿāukum faqad kadhabtum fasawfa yakūnu lizāman
